slides.title: Science Basics
slides.content:
**Physics:** Study of matter, energy
**Chemistry:** Elements, compounds, reactions
**Biology:** Living organisms
**Technology:** Application of science

slides.title: Indian Achievements
slides.content:
**ISRO:** Space research (Chandrayaan, Mangalyaan)
**IT:** Software, services
**Nuclear:** Atomic energy
**Defense:** Missiles, satellites
